items.preText: Mushfiqur and Shakib lead Bangladesh to new batting highs. A look at all the records that were broken in the first innings. Dig in.
items.text: punched to sweeper cover this time, a man placed specifically for that
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Markram, 1 run

items.preText: Zain: "I must say I'm beginning to get very nervous for South Africa. I had them down to win on cricket picks and the pressure is building. Good work from Bangladesh though..."
items.text: dabs this into the off side, looks for a single but can't get it
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to de Kock, no run

items.text: slower and fuller on the stumps, punched back. Good stop off his own bowling.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to de Kock, no run

items.preText: Venky: "Looking at the defensive fielding and bowling, bangladesh are trying to put pressure on South Africans by increasing the required rate. They should know players back themselves to chase anything in the end overs these days. Bangladesh should attack and take wkts to win this match"
items.text: leading edge, but safe! Lobs over gully and races to the boundary.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to de Kock, FOUR runs

items.text: tucks this to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Markram, no run

items.text: punched to long-on as they jog the single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Markram, 1 run

items.text: drifting into the pads, worked to backward square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: dropped but Mushfiqur makes amends But guess what? De Kock has been run out. Bangladeshi fans go from agony to ecstasy in a matter of two milliseconds. De Kock looks to cut, but gets a thin edge that is put down. Clearly nervous, he takes off for a run but is left high and dry as Markram doesn't move. Mushfiqur has the presence of mind to run quickly to his right, pick up the ball and hit the stumps at the striker's end to catch him well short. Brain fade from de Kock.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, OUT

dismissal.text: Q de Kock run out (†Mushfiqur Rahim) 23 (41m 32b 4x4 0x6) SR: 71.87

items.preText: Faf du Plessis walks in at No. 3
items.text: tucks this into the gap at square leg for an easy single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: mix-up, mix-up but they complete the run, weak throw at the bowler's end from Shakib at midwicket.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Markram, 1 run

items.text: skids one back in from around the stumps, punched to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, no run

items.text: quicker one angling in from wide of the crease, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, no run

items.text: goes right back and across as he defends from the crease
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, no run

items.text: driven down to long-off as they jog the single. Pressure building.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, 1 run

items.text: bunts this with the spin into the covers
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, no run

items.text: right behind the line as he defends
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, no run

items.preText:
Trihan: "Good captaincy from Mashrafe to bring in Shakib and attack Du Plessis. Would love to see another wicket fall soon."

Mashrafe into the attack
items.text: welcomed with a rasping cut shot, down to deep point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Markram, 1 run

items.text: full and swinging away from outside off, driven to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, 1 run

items.preText: Mani: "I'm glad to see that Du Plessis come up the order. Game needs a cool head here."
items.text: punched on the up to deep cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Markram, 1 run

items.text: slips this length ball on middle and leg, tucks this to deep square
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: defended from the crease
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Markram, no run

items.text: punches down to long-on for an easy single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Markram, 1 run

items.text: lunges forward and defends back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, no run

items.text: punches this down to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, 1 run

items.text: gets well forward and turns this to the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, no run
